name: @essent/nativescript-loading-indicator
description: A NativeScript plugin for showing an overlayed loading indicator for ios and android.
author: Nathan Walker <walkerrunpdx@gmail.com>

scripts.android.demo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-loading-indicator; tns plugin add ..; tns run android
scripts.ios.demo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-loading-indicator; tns plugin add ..; tns run ios
scripts.setup: npm i; cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
